comment: Wow...butter butter butter. Nutty and bits of dried fruit. Very friendly, bit of spice on the back end but love it. It’s like you mixed a higher proof bourbon and a spry side. Color, spice and oakyness from the bourbon, fruity, and buttery from the sort side.
Reminds me of Eagle Rare. Very buttery and herby
Nice brandy and nutty like stuff with notes of vanilla, chocolate, brown sugar, toffee, apricot, biscuits, and cherries.
